95.12: The tool has a unique name and an informative description.
95.15: Tutorials for the tool are available on the tool's homepage.
95.17: Previous versions of the tool are made available.
95.20: Licensing information is provided on the tool's homepage.

94.21: A standardized ID or accession number is used to identify the dataset.
94.22: The dataset is described with metadata using a formal, broadly applicable vocabulary.
94.24: The dataset is hosted in an established data repository, if a relevant repository exists.
94.25: The dataset can be downloaded for free from the repository.
94.26: Version information is provided for the dataset.
94.27: Contact information is provided for the creator(s) of the dataset.
94.28: Information is provided describing how to cite the dataset.
94.29: Licensing information is provided on the dataset's landing page.

93.30: The structure of the repository permits efficient discovery of data and metadata by end users.
93.31: The repository uses a standardized protocol to permit access by users.
93.32: The repository provides contact information for staff to enable users with questions or suggestions to interact with repository experts.
93.34: The repository maintains licenses to manage data access and use.
93.35: The repository hosts data and metadata according to a set of defined criteria to ensure that the resources provided are consistent with the intent of the repository.
93.36: The repository provides documentation for each resource to permit its complete and accurate citation.
93.37: A description of the methods used to acquire the data is provided.
93.38: Version information is provided for each resource, where available.
